ComicInfo.Title: The Airtist; New Shoe Zoom; The Doctor Is Way In; She Loves me, She Loves Me Not
ComicInfo.Summary: Every Valentine's Day, Charlie Brown waits by his mailbox, hoping against all odds, he will recieve his first ever Valentine. This will be the year everything will change! Or so he thinks... Lucy has a different opinion on the matter. Taking him through his prospective sweethearts, Lucy decides that this Valentine's Day, she will teach Charlie Brown to reign in his expectations.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 16:43:38. [CVDB446539]
ComicInfo.Writer: Charles M. Schulz, Jeff Dyer, Nat Gertler, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Penciller: Andy Hirsch, Charles M. Schulz, Robert Pope, Scott Jeralds, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Inker: Andy Hirsch, Charles M. Schulz, Justin Thompson, Paige Braddock, Robert Pope
ComicInfo.Colorist: Art Roche, Donna Almendrala, Justin Thompson, Lisa Moore
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Alexis E. Fajardo, Matt Gagnon, Shannon Watters
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Linus van Pelt, Lucy van Pelt
